languages.text: "Очень любит наш зверек Поиграть с людьми чуток. Раз прыжок и два — укус. Голова — ненужный груз. Кровь, кишки и суета. Будет бестия сыта".

traits.locale_text:
"Очень любит наш зверек
Поиграть с людьми чуток.
Раз прыжок и два — укус.
Голова — ненужный груз.
Кровь, кишки и суета.
Будет бестия сыта".
traits.speaker: FW_TrueGovernor_Buffoon

languages.text: "Little beasties like to play. People are their favourite prey. Champ and chomp and munch and crunch! Look! It's snapped your head away! Screams and tears and gore and more! Happy beastie, happy day!"
languages.original_text: "Очень любит наш зверек Поиграть с людьми чуток. Раз прыжок и два — укус. Голова — ненужный груз. Кровь, кишки и суета. Будет бестия сыта".

traits.locale_text:
"Little kitties like to play.
People are their favourite prey.
Jump and chomp and munch and crunch!
It has snapped your head away!
Screams and tears and gore and more!
Happy kitty, happy day!"

"Little kitties like to play.
People are their favourite prey.
Jump and chomp and munch and crunch!
It has snapped your head away!
Screams and tears and gore and more!
Happy kitty, happy day!"

"Little beasties like to play. People are their favourite prey. Champ and chomp and munch and crunch! Look! It's snapped your head away! Screams and tears and gore and more! Happy beastie, happy day!"

languages.text: “恶兽顽皮爱嬉闹， 美味人类成佳肴。 撕咬啃嚼声嘈嘈！ 头颅咔嚓一口咬！ 泪水血肉满天飘！ 兽欢庆典乐逍遥！”
languages.original_text: "Little beasties like to play. People are their favourite prey. Champ and chomp and munch and crunch! Look! It's snapped your head away! Screams and tears and gore and more! Happy beastie, happy day!"

traits.locale_text:
“恶兽顽皮爱嬉闹，
美味人类成佳肴。
撕咬啃嚼声嘈嘈！
头颅咔嚓一口咬！
泪水血肉满天飘！
兽欢庆典乐逍遥！”

languages.text: 「ちっちゃなケモノが今もはしゃぐよ いちばん好きなのは？それはにんげんだよ！ ガブリと噛んで、ムシャムシャバリバリ ひと噛みすれば、首すぐポロリ！ 叫んで泣いて、血まみれ祭り！ ちっちゃなケモノがニコニコ踊り！ なんて素敵な日！」
languages.original_text: "Little beasties like to play. People are their favourite prey. Champ and chomp and munch and crunch! Look! It's snapped your head away! Screams and tears and gore and more! Happy beastie, happy day!"

traits.locale_text:
「ちっちゃなケモノたちは遊ぶのが大好き。
一番好きな獲物は、そう、人間！
ガブッとかじって、ムシャムシャバリバリ！
ほら見てごらん！あんたの首がちぎれたよ！
悲鳴に涙、血まみれの饗宴！
ケモノは大喜び。なんて素敵な日だろうね！」

languages.text: «Las fieras quieren jugar. Gente prefieren cazar. ¡Muerden y roen, mastican y tragan! ¡Cabezas van a arrancar! ¡Gritad, llorad, sangrad más! ¡Fiera feliz, día feliz!».
languages.original_text: "Little beasties like to play. People are their favourite prey. Champ and chomp and munch and crunch! Look! It's snapped your head away! Screams and tears and gore and more! Happy beastie, happy day!"

traits.locale_text:
«Las fieras quieren jugar.
Gente prefieren cazar.
¡Muerden y roen, mastican y tragan!
¡Cabezas van a arrancar!
¡Gritad, llorad, sangrad más!
¡Fiera feliz, día feliz!».

languages.text: "Minik canavarlar sever oynamayı, İnsanlardır en sevdikleri avı. Hapur hupur çiğner, ısırır, ezer! Bak! Kafanı koparmış meğer! Çığlık, yaş, kan ve beterleri! Mutlu canavar, mutlu günler beri!"
languages.original_text: "Little beasties like to play. People are their favourite prey. Champ and chomp and munch and crunch! Look! It's snapped your head away! Screams and tears and gore and more! Happy beastie, happy day!"

traits.locale_text:
"Minik canavarlar sever oynamayı,
İnsanlardır en sevdikleri avı.
Hapur hupur çiğner, ısırır, ezer!
Bak! Kafanı koparmış meğer!
Çığlık, yaş, kan ve beterleri!
Mutlu canavar, mutlu günler beri!"

languages.text: « Les bestioles aiment jouer. Les gens sont leurs proies favorites. Mord et croque, ronge et gobe ! Regardez ! Elle vous a arraché la tête ! Cris, larmes, tripes et plus encore ! Bestiole ravie, journée réussie ! »
languages.original_text: "Little beasties like to play. People are their favourite prey. Champ and chomp and munch and crunch! Look! It's snapped your head away! Screams and tears and gore and more! Happy beastie, happy day!"

traits.locale_text:
« Les bestioles aiment jouer.
Les gens sont leurs proies favorites.
Mord et croque, ronge et gobe !
Regardez ! Elle vous a arraché la tête !
Cris, larmes, tripes et plus encore !
Bestiole ravie, journée réussie ! »

languages.text: "Kleine Biester spielen heute. Fressen gerne alle Leute. Knusper, knusper, mampf und malm. Da! Jetzt ist Euer Kopf gefall'n! Schreie, Tränen, Gedärm und Blut. Frohe Bestie, alles gut!"
languages.original_text: "Little beasties like to play. People are their favourite prey. Champ and chomp and munch and crunch! Look! It's snapped your head away! Screams and tears and gore and more! Happy beastie, happy day!"

traits.locale_text:
"Kleine Biester spielen heute.
Fressen gerne alle Leute.
Knusper, knusper, mampf und malm.Da! Jetzt ist Euer Kopf gefall'n!
Schreie, Tränen, Gedärm und Blut.
Frohe Bestie, alles gut!"
